thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Adrian

author: Adrian
title: Adrian
text: Prior to purchasing 1 Jeffery Street, we had previously been in the market in search of the perfect home for many many months. The home we were searching for had to tick all the boxes; 3 bedroom, 2 car garage, decent sized block of land, nice area, close to public transport etc - basically a home with a 10 year plan. During our search, Truc was constantly sending new listings for numerous houses we might be interested in and eventually, her dedication paid off. From the moment Jeffery Street was listed, she walked us through the house multiple times and made herself available to answer all of our questions within a reasonable time frame. Truc, we cannot thank you enough for all your hard work during this long process. We would definitely recommend yourself and Nelson Alexander to our friends and family!
